original_text: The cedars in the garden of God could not hide him: the fir trees were not like his boughs, and the chestnut trees were not like his branches; nor any tree in the garden of God was like unto him in his beauty.
korean_text: 하나님의 동산의 백향목이 능히 그를 가리지 못하며 잣나무가 그 굵은 가지만 못하며 단풍나무가 그 가는 가지만 못하며 하나님의 동산의 어떤 나무도 그 아름다운 모양과 같지 못하였도다

sentences.original_text: The cedars in the garden of God could not hide him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 동산에 있는 백향목들은 그를 숨길 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: the fir trees were not like his boughs
sentences.korean_translation: 전나무들은 그의 굵은 가지와 같지 않았다

sentences.original_text: the chestnut trees were not like his branches
nor any tree in the garden of God was like unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 동산의 어떤 나무도 그와 같지 않았다
